sentences.en: " You better be fearless and confident yourself, old man, " he said.
sentences.cn: “ 你最好自己也毫无畏惧而信心十足, 老家伙, " 他说.

sentences.en: About his ordinary bearing there was a certain fling, a fearless expectation of success.
sentences.cn: 他平素的举止不免有些锋芒, 显得他志向远大,无所畏惧.

sentences.en: But he was such a calm, strong fish and he seemed so fearless and so confident.
sentences.cn: 不过它是一条那样沉着 、 健壮的鱼,似乎是毫无畏惧而信心十足的.

sentences.en: He gave them his honest opinion, fearless of the consequences.
sentences.cn: 他不顾后果地告诉了他们他的真实想法.

sentences.en: He should be fearless , bear his unluctable fate with equanimity.
sentences.cn: 人应当无所畏惧, 对不可避免的命运安之若泰.

sentences.en: He was such a calm , strong fish and he seemed so fearless and so confident.
sentences.cn: 这条鱼是这样的沉着, 这样的强壮,这样的毫不惧怕又这样的充满信心.

sentences.en: I like his dark, glancing, fearless eyes.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他那对黑色的, 目光炯炯的 、 天不怕地不怕的眼睛.

sentences.en: I thought her utterly fearless until that day in late August.
sentences.cn: 我一直以为她什么都不怕,到了那年八月底那天,才知道不然.

sentences.en: Mr Heathcliff, I believe, had not treated him physically ill; thanks to his fearless nature.
sentences.cn: 我相信希刺克厉夫先生在肉体上不曾虐待过他; 多亏他有无畏的天性.

sentences.en: Newborn calves are not afraid of tigers. -- Young people are fearless.
sentences.cn: 初生之 犊 不畏虎.
这个男孩似乎毫不畏惧.

sentences.en: The soldiers followed their fearless leader into the battle.
sentences.cn: 士兵们随着他们勇敢的指挥官投入战斗.

sentences.en: They had achieved the reputation of being fearless fighters.
sentences.cn: 他们已经得到了无畏战士的名声.

sentences.en: To go in for technical innovation, one must have the fearless spirit of a pathbreaker.
sentences.cn: 搞技术革新就要有一股不怕困难的闯劲.

sentences.en: You know the advantage of prompt and fearless action.
sentences.cn: 你懂得采取果断和大胆的行动有什么好处.
